name: maxun
description: Maxun is a self-hosted personal knowledge base that organizes thoughts, notes, and bookmarks into a structured context graph. It features tagging, hierarchical navigation, and a minimal UI for modern workflows.
features: Knowledge graph: Visualize connections between notes, bookmarks, and ideas in an interactive graph.
Hierarchical navigation: Organize information in nested structures with parent-child relationships.
Tag system: Apply multiple tags to items for flexible cross-referencing and filtering.
Bookmark management: Save and organize web links with automatic metadata extraction.
Note taking: Capture thoughts and information with rich text formatting and Markdown support.
Search functionality: Find any item quickly using full-text search across all content types.
Context preservation: Maintain relationships between related items to preserve knowledge context.
Quick capture: Rapidly add new items with keyboard shortcuts and browser extensions.
Export options: Download your knowledge base in standard formats for backup or migration.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution keeps your personal knowledge completely private.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage your knowledge base from any device.
API access: Integrate with other tools or build custom workflows using the REST API.
